short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your book or manga pages, anime episodes or whatever you like, with a reminder text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you can save the active page URL directly to your browser's storage with a brief description like; "Gon meets Killua!"

This extension can be used for any type of website! Whether you're watching anime, saving a YouTube video to watch later or tracking anything else, this tool is versatile!

Features:
- Save any webpage from any website.
- Add descriptions to saved pages.
- Update the reminder text of saved entries.
- Delete individual entries.
- Bulk delete entries.
- Export saved entries as JSON.
- Import entries from a JSON file.
- Search through entries (by reminder text, URL, or title).
- Switch between saving and searching modes.

Example Use Cases:
- Tracking long manga series like Berserk.
- To remember episodes of anime youâ€™re watching.
- Save sources while doing research.
- Save links of products you like.

Note:
All data is stored locally since the extension does not use a database.

Shortcuts
"Ctrl + ]" : Toggle between Search and Save modes.
"Ctrl + Left Click" : Delete the entry after opening it.
"Alt + M" : Reload the extension in case of a bug.
